about_the_game:
Estilhaço is an investigative and suspenseful game that places players at the center of a dark plot involving the mysterious company IDrean. Assume the role of a protagonist whose younger brother has mysteriously disappeared.

Explore surreal and distorted environments, unraveling puzzles while confronting the horror that challenges the border between reality and nightmare.

To do this, use your smartphone as an essential tool, dodging horrors and exploring a world where innovation becomes your greatest threat.

Prepare for an intense experience that goes beyond the bounds of the ordinary.
